template.name: gradleProperty
template.content:
#maven仓库地址 maven_repo = http://172.16.1.188:8082/content/groups/public #springboot版本 spring_boot_version = 2.0.3.RELEASE #spring dependency spring_dep_version = 1.0.5.RELEASE #包名 group_name = ${packageName} #jdk java_version = 1.8 #mybatis mybatis_spring_version = 1.2.0 #swagger swagger_version = 2.7.0 #druid druid_version = 1.1.10 #guava guava_version = 23.0 #lombok lombok_version = 1.16.16 #hotpotmaterial hotpotmaterial_common_version = 0.0.3 hotpotmaterial_jsonmeta_version = 0.0.3 #jsr310 mybatis_typehandlers_jsr310_version = 1.0.2 #pagehelper pagehelper_version = 5.1.4 pagehelper_spring_boot_starter_version = 1.2.5 #jar jar_name = ${projectName} jar_version = 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT #gradle gradle_version = 4.3.1
<#if hasOracle == "1"> oracle_version = 12.1.0.1-atlassian-hosted </#if> <#if hasMysql == "1"> mysql_version = 5.1.43 </#if>
